column1: #Text=Piandao says : " The warrior practices a variety of arts to keep his mind sharp and fluid .
#Text=" Piandao says : " When you write your name , you stamp the paper with your identity .
#Text=You must learn to use your sword to stamp your identity on a battlefield .
#Text=Remember , you can not take back a stroke of the brush , or a stroke of the sword .
#Text=" Piandao says : " You are getting ink on your face .
#Text=So this is about putting my identity on the page , right ?
